name: mithril-ui-form-project
description: Based on a JSON document, generate a UI form for the Mithril framework.
author: Erik Vullings <erik.vullings@gmail.com> (http://www.tno.nl)

scripts.start: pnpm run build:deps && pnpm -r --parallel run dev
scripts.build:deps: pnpm --filter mithril-ui-form-plugin build && pnpm --filter mithril-ui-form-rating-plugin build && pnpm --filter mithril-ui-form-leaflet-plugin build && pnpm --filter mithril-ui-form build
